about_the_game:
In this DLC, players can experience the following content:
1.Seven brand new forces outside the Great Wall.

◇Different Generals: the real foreign generals in the history of the Three Kingdoms appear one by one;
◇Buildings with Different Styles: Each foreign stronghold has its own unique architectural style;




◇Brand-new Units: Da Zang, Shao Dang, Gao Que, Sheng Le, Pinggang Cavalry, Nanye Infantry.
◇New battlefields: Four field battles with a strong exotic flavour.


◇New Gameplay: Players can be friendly with ethnic minorities in Diplomacy or request foreign troops to attack other hostile forces in Strategy.
◇Infestation of the frontier: If the relationship with the foreign forces is not handled well, they will continue to infest the frontier cities adjacent to them, greatly affecting the development of the cities and even razing them to the ground ......
◇Never Die: Cities of foreign forces cannot be occupied. Their forces will only succumb for a short time, after which they will come back again.

2.Twelve bandits

◇Historic Officers: In addition to the usual NPC officers, there will be some historical officers in the fortress according to historical facts.
◇Historic offficers can be recruited: If players defeat the thief, there is a chance that the historic officers will surrender.
◇Different types of cottages: northwest, central, and south-central cottages, as well as riverside water cottages.




◇New Battlefields: Five different geographical bandit battlefields.


◇Harassment of Cities: Bandits will have a debuff effect on their neighboring cities, which will reduce the city's money and food revenue. In addition, the bandits also have a certain chance to attack the city, if the defenses are not strong, the city will be captured.
◇Never Die: The bandit stronghold cannot be occupied, and will be in "abandoned" state. If it is captured, it has a certain chance to reappear as time goes by.

3.instance Of Four Beasts
◇Field instances: A new field instance system is introduced on the big map, where players can freely go out to crusade.
◇The Four Spirits of Heaven: The four ancient Chinese beasts, Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Black Tortoisewill appear in the game in the form of SUPER BOSS.




◇New Battlefields: Four replica battlefields that fit the characteristics of the beasts.


◇Unique skills: each beast has its own unique and powerful skills.





◇Generous rewards: Victory in conquering the beast will result in the acquisition of new exclusive sets of equipment (Lu Bu, Guan Yu, Zhen Ji and Cai Wen Ji).

short_description: In the last years of the Han Dynasty, the empire was plunged into long-term chaos and turmoil. The warlords fought with each other; bandits run rampant; foreign races disturbed the frontiers; ancient beasts seem to be coming to the world soon...
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
